scripts.build: curl -sS https://raw.githubusercontent.com/timo-reymann/rind/1.1.1/core/rind | bash -s - --runtime cimg/node:18.11 --main-cmd "npm run bundle && npm run zip" --setup-cmd "curl -sS https://raw.githubusercontent.com/timo-reymann/deterministic-zip/main/installer | bash && npm run clean && npm install" --artifacts "dist/" --log-level DEBUG
